channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Homeland Security is trying to force tech companies to hand over data about Trump critics
item.description: The use of administrative subpoenas, which are not subject to judicial oversight, are used to demand a wealth of information from tech companies, incl...

item.title: Intel will start making GPUs, a market dominated by Nvidia
item.description: Intel has been bulking up a team to focus on this effort and will develop its GPU strategy around customer needs.

item.title: Republicans Are All In on Boosting Fraud Allegations in California
item.description: Right-wing influencers who were instrumental in spreading allegations of fraud in Minnesota ahead of ICE’s surge are now going after a number of Calif...

item.title: Upgrade Your Roku Before the Big Game
item.description: Roku is knocking down the price of all of its streaming devices ahead of football’s big game.

item.title: The Minneapolis tech community holds strong during ‘tense and difficult time’
item.description: Founders and investors in the Minneapolis tech industry told TechCrunch they've put much of their work on hold to help out their community.

item.title: 2026 plans: What’s next for Startup Battlefield 200

item.title: An ‘Intimacy Crisis’ Is Driving the Dating Divide

item.title: I Infiltrated Moltbook, the AI-Only Social Network Where Humans Aren’t Allowed

item.title: YC startups can now receive investment in stablecoin
item.description: All startups accepted into YC will soon have the option to receive their seed checks via stablecoins.
